item.title: How to implement a gradient picker in Houdini
item.description: #Introduction The other day, I will introduce how to implement a gradation picker like Substance Designer, which Mr. Ando announced in PySide Study Group, in Houdini. Introduction to Andou-san’s gradation picker, commentary article When actually used, the gradation picked up by the picker is applied to the ramp parameter as shown below. The image below loads the image into the network editor, but you can get the color anywhere on the screen.

item.title: callback using pyside:MEventMessage
item.description: *This article is the 14th day of Maya Advent Calendar 2019. * I’m very sorry, but I will participate. When you want to execute some processing when the state transitions on maya scriptJob is a staple, but I will try using OpenMaya.MEventMessage, which is simpler and lighter. This time I briefly wrote about how to use it on the pyside GUI. Let’s change the label text by looking at the selected node type.

item.title: How to get help on HDA (with extra Python script)
item.description: This article is the 8th day article of [**Houdini Advent Calender 2019**](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/houdini). Nowadays, Houdini is used in various industries, and I think various HDAs are being developed by various companies. On the other hand, if management and documentation are not maintained, **you can not understand how to use HDA created by others, and you can not know what kind of HDA exists **. This article will show you how to create tooltips and your own documentation for the parameters shown below.
